name: Zombie Hoops
description:
Toss zombie heads through the hoop in this gameroom classic!

Zombie Hoops is an arcade syle basketball game. Fun packed action for 2 players, or 1 player vs the computer. Bank shots to earn extra points. Fill up the power meter to activate the point multiplier. Make as many shots as possible before the clock runs out!

Features:

* 1 or 2 Players
* 1 Player mode vs Computer
* Fast basketball hoops action
* Bank shots
* Power meter multiplier
* Super cool zombie heads
* Cool spooky soundtrack
